thread.title: Royals return to World Series, beat Blue Jays in ALCS Game 6
thread.title_full: Royals return to World Series, beat Blue Jays in ALCS Game 6

author:
Dave Skretta
The Associated Press
title: Royals return to World Series, beat Blue Jays in ALCS Game 6
text:
Previous Next Royals return to World Series, beat Blue Jays in ALCS Game 6 
The Royals’ Lorenzo Cain celebrates after scoring what turned out to be the winning run against the Blue Jays in the eighth inning Friday in Kansas City. The Royals advance to the World Series. Matt Slocum/The Associated Press Posted: Friday, October 23, 2015 11:00 pm Royals return to World Series, beat Blue Jays in ALCS Game 6 Associated Press | 0 comments 
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — The Royals earned another champagne shower at Kauffman Stadium. 
Lorenzo Cain sprinted home from first base on Eric Hosmer’s single in the eighth inning, Wade Davis weathered a 45-minute rain delay and a white-knuckle ninth, and Kansas City beat the Toronto Blue Jays 4-3 Friday night to earn its second straight trip to the World Series.
